a.dialog: i May have half lied to you
when I say 'you' i moreso meant me. its Like a literature puzzle
cuz Sometimes I do mean 'you' as you, but sometimes I mean 'you' as me
like When you broke all the annoying chains
so Technically, i did not lie to you!
but Some people will say that a lie of omission or misguiding is still a lie
if You are, sorry to disappoint you
anyway, Would you like to know what was actually in there?
everything You, as in me, could have ever wanted!
